typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Tipo1 as string,
		Tipo2 as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Drv_Act as string,
		COD_UEN as string,
		UEN as string,
		SAG as string,
		COD_SAG as string,
		Material as string,
		Des_Mat as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Sector as string,
		Innovacion as string,
		Clasificacion as string,
		Beerhouse as string,
		SubCupo as string,
		Onzas as string,
		PackPresentacion as string,
		Familia as string,
		High_End as string,
		Origen as string,
		Abr_19 as string,
		May_19 as string,
		Ene_20 as string,
		Feb_20 as string,
		Mar_20 as string,
		Abr_20 as string,
		May_20 as string,
		Jun_20 as string,
		Jul_20 as string,
		Ago_20 as string,
		Sep_20 as string,
		Oct_20 as string,
		Nov_20 as string,
		Dic_20 as string,
		Ene_21 as string,
		Feb_21 as string,
		Mar_21 as string,
		Abr_21 as string,
		May_21 as string,
		Jun_21 as string,
		Jul_21 as string,
		Ago_21 as string,
		Sep_21 as string,
		Oct_21 as string,
		Nov_21 as string,
		Dic_21 as string,
		AcumDia_19 as string,
		AcumDia_21 as string,
		MTD_19 as string,
		Tend as string,
		YTD_19 as string,
		YTD_21 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseSales
source(output(
		Material as string,
		Texto_breve_de_material as string,
		Mercado as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Envase as string,
		Factor as string,
		Cupo1 as string,
		Cupo2 as string,
		Ce as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		Subagencia as string,
		COD_SAG as string,
		Ce2 as string,
		Ce3 as string,
		Zona2 as string,
		Agencia2 as string,
		Subagencia2 as string,
		Id as string,
		Tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseCatalog
SourceSynapseCatalog select(mapColumn(
		SAG_CAT = Subagencia,
		COD_SAG_CAT = COD_SAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG
JoinCODSAGtoCODSAGCAT select(mapColumn(
		Tipo1,
		Tipo2,
		Tipo,
		Drv_Act,
		COD_UEN,
		UEN,
		SAG,
		COD_SAG,
		Material,
		Des_Mat,
		Marca,
		Cupo,
		Segmento,
		Sector,
		Innovacion,
		Clasificacion,
		Beerhouse,
		SubCupo,
		Onzas,
		PackPresentacion,
		Familia,
		High_End,
		Origen,
		Abr_19,
		May_19,
		Ene_20,
		Feb_20,
		Mar_20,
		Abr_20,
		May_20,
		Jun_20,
		Jul_20,
		Ago_20,
		Sep_20,
		Oct_20,
		Nov_20,
		Dic_20,
		Ene_21,
		Feb_21,
		Mar_21,
		Abr_21,
		May_21,
		Jun_21,
		Jul_21,
		Ago_21,
		Sep_21,
		Oct_21,
		Nov_21,
		Dic_21,
		AcumDia_19,
		AcumDia_21,
		MTD_19,
		Tend,
		YTD_19,
		YTD_21,
		SAG_CAT,
		COD_SAG_CAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
FilterBySAG sort(asc(COD_SAG_CAT, true),
	asc(SAG_CAT, true),
	asc(Material, true),
	asc(Des_Mat, true)) ~> SortRows1
SelectColumns filter(isNull(SAG_CAT)) ~> FilterByNullsSAG
SelectColumns filter(!isNull(SAG_CAT)) ~> FilterBySAG
SourceSynapseSales, SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG join(trim(upper(COD_SAG)) == trim(upper(COD_SAG_CAT)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinCODSAGtoCODSAGCAT
FilterByNullsSAG, SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG join(trim(upper(SAG)) == trim(upper(SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG@SAG_CAT)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSAGtoSubangecia
JoinSAGtoSubangecia select(mapColumn(
		Tipo1,
		Tipo2,
		Tipo,
		Drv_Act,
		COD_UEN,
		UEN,
		SAG,
		COD_SAG,
		Material,
		Des_Mat,
		Marca,
		Cupo,
		Segmento,
		Sector,
		Innovacion,
		Clasificacion,
		Beerhouse,
		SubCupo,
		Onzas,
		PackPresentacion,
		Familia,
		High_End,
		Origen,
		Abr_19,
		May_19,
		Ene_20,
		Feb_20,
		Mar_20,
		Abr_20,
		May_20,
		Jun_20,
		Jul_20,
		Ago_20,
		Sep_20,
		Oct_20,
		Nov_20,
		Dic_20,
		Ene_21,
		Feb_21,
		Mar_21,
		Abr_21,
		May_21,
		Jun_21,
		Jul_21,
		Ago_21,
		Sep_21,
		Oct_21,
		Nov_21,
		Dic_21,
		AcumDia_19,
		AcumDia_21,
		MTD_19,
		Tend,
		YTD_19,
		YTD_21,
		SAG_CAT = SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG@SAG_CAT,
		COD_SAG_CAT = SelectSubagenciaAndCODSAG@COD_SAG_CAT
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsFromNullSAG
SelectColumnsFromNullSAG sort(asc(COD_SAG_CAT, true),
	asc(SAG_CAT, true),
	asc(Material, true),
	asc(Des_Mat, true)) ~> SortRows2
SortRows1 sink(input(
		Tipo1 as string,
		Tipo2 as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Drv_Act as string,
		COD_UEN as string,
		UEN as string,
		SAG as string,
		COD_SAG as string,
		Material as string,
		Des_Mat as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Segmento as string,
		Sector as string,
		Innovacion as string,
		Clasificacion as string,
		Beerhouse as string,
		SubCupo as string,
		Onzas as string,
		PackPresentacion as string,
		Familia as string,
		High_End as string,
		Origen as string,
		Abr_19 as string,
		May_19 as string,
		Ene_20 as string,
		Feb_20 as string,
		Mar_20 as string,
		Abr_20 as string,
		May_20 as string,
		Jun_20 as string,
		Jul_20 as string,
		Ago_20 as string,
		Sep_20 as string,
		Oct_20 as string,
		Nov_20 as string,
		Dic_20 as string,
		Ene_21 as string,
		Feb_21 as string,
		Mar_21 as string,
		Abr_21 as string,
		May_21 as string,
		Jun_21 as string,
		Jul_21 as string,
		Ago_21 as string,
		Sep_21 as string,
		Oct_21 as string,
		Nov_21 as string,
		Dic_21 as string,
		AcumDia_19 as string,
		AcumDia_21 as string,
		MTD_19 as string,
		Tend as string,
		YTD_19 as string,
		YTD_21 as string,
		SAG_CAT as string,
		COD_SAG_CAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseConsolidation1
SortRows2 sink(input(
		Tipo1 as string,
		Tipo2 as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Drv_Act as string,
		COD_UEN as string,
		UEN as string,
		SAG as string,

		Abr_19 as string,
		May_19 as string,
		Ene_20 as string,
		Feb_20 as string,
		Mar_20 as string,
		Abr_20 as string,
		May_20 as string,
		Jun_20 as string,
		Jul_20 as string,
		Ago_20 as string,
		Sep_20 as string,
		Oct_20 as string,
		Nov_20 as string,
		Dic_20 as string,
		Ene_21 as string,
		Feb_21 as string,
		Mar_21 as string,
		Abr_21 as string,
		May_21 as string,
		Jun_21 as string,
		Jul_21 as string,
		Ago_21 as string,
		Sep_21 as string,
		Oct_21 as string,
		Nov_21 as string,
		Dic_21 as string,
		AcumDia_19 as string,
		AcumDia_21 as string,
		MTD_19 as string,
		Tend as string,
		YTD_19 as string,
		YTD_21 as string,
		SAG_CAT as string,
		COD_SAG_CAT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseConsolidation2

source(output(
		ClDocuCompras as string,
		DocuCompras as string,
		Proveedor as string,
		Posicion as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreve as string,
		CantidadPedido as string,
		UnidadMedidaPedido as string,
		Centro as string,
		Almacen as string,
		Entrega as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string,
		FechaEntrega as string,
		ClaseMovimiento1 as string,
		DocuMaterial1 as string,
		Cantidad1 as string,
		Lote1 as string,
		FeContabilizacion1 as string,
		ClaseMovimiento2 as string,
		DocuMaterial2 as string,
		Cantidad2 as string,
		Lote2 as string,
		FeContabilizacion2 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT *\nFROM ext.mex_log_reverlog_trans_status\nWHERE TRIM(UPPER(StaTotMovMercancia)) LIKE \'C\'',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseTranStatus
source(output(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion as string,
		Denominacion1 as string,
		DestinatarioMercancia as string,
		Nombre1 as string,
		NTransporte as string,
		AgenteServicios as string,
		Nombre2 as string,
		Entrega as string,
		Posicion as string,
		TipoPosicion as string,
		Denominacion2 as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreveMaterial as string,
		CantidadEntrega as string,
		UnidadMedidaBase as string,
		FeMovMercanciaReal as string,
		DocumentoModelo as string,
		NPedido as string,
		Creado as string,
		IdentiExterna1 as string,
		IdentiExterna2 as string,
		IDTrackingTransp as string,
		ClaseExpedicion as string,
		Denominacion3 as string,
		RutaPTransporte as string,
		Denominacion4 as string,
		FePlanifRegistro as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT *\nFROM ext.mex_log_reverlog_trans_trans\nWHERE TRIM(UPPER(StaTotMovMercancia)) LIKE \'C\'',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseTrans
source(output(
		i2 as string,
		NSociedadNueva as string,
		NSociedadAnterior as string,
		IDSAGNueva as string,
		IDSAGAnterior as string,
		DRVNva as string,
		DRV as string,
		DescripcionUEN as string,
		DescripcionUENCorto as string,
		Esquema as string,
		Estado as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Distribucion as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		SubAgencia as string,
		TipoInv as string,
		OrigenJDA as string,
		DestinoJDA as string,
		DescripcionDestino as string,
		{TipoDistribución} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseDestination
source(output(
		EtiquetasFila as string,
		SumaTarimas as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseTarima
source(output(
		DocumentoCompras as string,
		NumNecesidad as string,
		NombreProveedor as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * \nFROM ext.mex_log_reverlog_trans_itme2n\nWHERE DocumentoCompras IS NOT NULL OR DocumentoCompras <> \'\'',
	format: 'query',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSyanpseTransITME2N
SourceSynapseTranStatus derive(Centro = replace(Centro, 'AL', 'FL')) ~> ReplaceCentro
SourceSynapseTrans select(mapColumn(
		PtoExpedicPtoRecepcion,
		Denominacion1,
		DestinatarioMercancia,
		Nombre1,
		NTransporte,
		AgenteServicios,
		Nombre2,
		Entrega,
		Posicion,
		TipoPosicion,
		Denominacion2,
		Material,
		TextoBreveMaterial,
		CantidadEntrega,
		UnidadMedidaBase,
		FeMovMercanciaReal,
		DocumentoModelo,
		NPedido,
		Creado,
		IdentiExterna1,
		IdentiExterna2,
		IDTrackingTransp,
		ClaseExpedicion,
		Denominacion3,
		RutaPTransporte,
		Denominacion4,
		FePlanifRegistro,
		StaTotMovMercancia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransColumns
SourceSynapseDestination select(mapColumn(
		Centro_Des = IDSAGNueva,
		Agencia_Des = DescripcionUENCorto,
		OP_Des = Tipo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectDestinationColumns
SourceSynapseTarima select(mapColumn(
		EtiquetasFila_Tarima = EtiquetasFila,
		SumaTarimas_Materia = SumaTarimas
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTarimaColumns
ReplaceCentro, SelectDestinationColumns join(trim(upper(Centro)) == trim(upper(Centro_Des)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinTranStatusAndDestination
SourceSyanpseTransITME2N select(mapColumn(
		DocumentoCompras_TransITME2N = DocumentoCompras,
		Folio_TransITME2N = NumNecesidad,
		NombreProveedor_TransITME2N = NombreProveedor
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectTransITME2NColumns
LeftJoinTranStatusAndDestination, SourceSyanpseTransITME2N join(trim(upper(DocuCompras)) == trim(upper(DocumentoCompras)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinNewTranStatusAndTransITME2N
LeftJoinNewTranStatusAndTransITME2N, SelectTransColumns join(trim(upper(DocuCompras)) == trim(upper(DocumentoModelo)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinNewTransStatus2AndTrans
LeftJoinNewTransStatus2AndTrans select(mapColumn(
		ClDocuCompras,
		DocuCompras,
		Proveedor,
		Posicion = SourceSynapseTranStatus@Posicion,
		Material = SourceSynapseTranStatus@Material,
		TextoBreve,
		CantidadPedido,
		UnidadMedidaPedido,
		Centro,
		Almacen,
		Entrega = SourceSynapseTranStatus@Entrega,
		StaTotMovMercancia = SourceSynapseTranStatus@StaTotMovMercancia,
		FechaEntrega,
		ClaseMovimiento1,
		DocuMaterial1,
		Cantidad1,
		Lote1,
		FeContabilizacion1,
		ClaseMovimiento2,
		DocuMaterial2,
		Cantidad2,
		Lote2,
		FeContabilizacion2,
		Centro_Des,
		Agencia_Des,
		OP_Des,
		DocumentoCompras_TransITME2N = DocumentoCompras,
		Folio_TransITME2N = NumNecesidad,
		NombreProveedor__TransITME2N = NombreProveedor,
		StaTotMovMercancia_Trans = SelectTransColumns@StaTotMovMercancia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectNewTransStatusColums
SelectNewTransStatusColums sink(input(
		ClDocuCompras as string,
		DocuCompras as string,
		Proveedor as string,
		Posicion as string,
		Material as string,
		TextoBreve as string,
		CantidadPedido as string,
		UnidadMedidaPedido as string,
		Centro as string,
		Almacen as string,
		Entrega as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia as string,
		FechaEntrega as string,
		ClaseMovimiento1 as string,
		DocuMaterial1 as string,
		Cantidad1 as string,
		Lote1 as string,
		FeContabilizacion1 as string,
		ClaseMovimiento2 as string,
		DocuMaterial2 as string,
		Cantidad2 as string,
		Lote2 as string,
		FeContabilizacion2 as string,
		Agencia_Des as string,
		OP_Des as string,
		DocumentoCompras_TransITME2N as string,
		Folio_TransITME2N as string,
		NombreProveedor__TransITME2N as string,
		StaTotMovMercancia_Trans as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		ClDocuCompras,
		DocuCompras,
		Proveedor,
		Posicion,
		Material,
		TextoBreve,
		CantidadPedido,
		UnidadMedidaPedido,
		Centro,
		Almacen,
		Entrega,
		StaTotMovMercancia,
		FechaEntrega,
		ClaseMovimiento1,
		DocuMaterial1,
		Cantidad1,
		Lote1,
		FeContabilizacion1,
		ClaseMovimiento2,
		DocuMaterial2,
		Cantidad2,
		Lote2,
		FeContabilizacion2,
		Centro_Des,
		Agencia_Des,
		OP_Des,
		DocumentoCompras_TransITME2N,
		Folio_TransITME2N,
		NombreProveedor__TransITME2N,
		StaTotMovMercancia_Trans
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSyanpseFinalTranStatus

	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,

source(output(
		Material as string,
		Texto_breve_de_material as string,
		Mercado as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Envase as string,
		Factor as string,
		Cupo1 as string,
		Cupo2 as string,
		Ce as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		Subagencia as string,
		COD_SAG as string,
		Ce2 as string,
		Ce3 as string,
		Zona2 as string,
		Agencia2 as string,
		Subagencia2 as string,
		Id as string,
		Tipo as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> SourceSynapseCatalog
SourceSynapseCatalog select(mapColumn(
		SAG_CAT = Subagencia,
		COD_SAG_CAT = COD_SAG
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,

SelecColumnsConsolidation unpivot(output(
		Mes as string,
		HLVentas as string
	),
	ungroupBy(CODSAG,
		SAG,
		Material,
		Descripcion),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> UnpivotSalesMonths
SourceSynapseConsolidation select(mapColumn(
		Material,
		Descripcion = Des_Mat,
		Ene20 = Ene_20,
		Feb20 = Feb_20,
		Mar20 = Mar_20,
		Abr20 = Abr_20,

	),

		Centro = Ce3,
		DRV = Zona2,
		UEN = Agencia2,
		Agencia = Subagencia2,
		Proveedor = Tipo
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsCentDRVUENAgenProv
SourceSynapseCatalog2 select(mapColumn(
		Material,
		Envase,
		Cupo1,
		Cupo2
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsMaterEnvaUsadCupo1And2
FilterByHLVentaNotEqual0, SelectColumnsCentDRVUENAgenProv join(trim(upper(CODSAG)) == trim(upper(Centro)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesMonthsAndCentDRVUENAgenProv
JoinSalesMonthsAndCentDRVUENAgenProv select(mapColumn(
		Centro,
		DRV,
		UEN,
		Agencia,
		Proveedor,
		CODSAG,
		SAG,
		Material,
		Descripcion,
		Mes,
		HLVentas
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFirstColumns
SelectFirstColumns, SelectColumnsMaterEnvaUsadCupo1And2 join(SelectFirstColumns@Material == SelectColumnsMaterEnvaUsadCupo1And2@Material,
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> JoinSalesMonthsAndMaterEnvaUsadCupo1And2
CreateColumnsAnoAndMes select(mapColumn(
		Ano,
		Mes,
		Centro,
		DRV,
		UEN,
		Agencia,
		EnvaseUsado = Envase,
		Proveedor,
		Cupo1,
		Cupo2,
		SAG,
		CODSAG,
		Material = SelectFirstColumns@Material,
		Descripcion,
		HLVentas,
		Agencia
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectFinalColumns
JoinSalesMonthsAndMaterEnvaUsadCupo1And2 derive(Ano = case(endsWith(Mes, '21'), 2021,
     endsWith(Mes, '20'), 2020),
		Mes = case(startsWith(Mes, 'Ene'), 'Enero',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Feb'), 'Febrero',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Mar'), 'Marzo',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Abr'), 'Abril',
     startsWith(Mes, 'May'), 'Mayo',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Jun'), 'Junio',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Jul'), 'Julio',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Ago'), 'Agosto',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Sep'), 'Septiembre',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Oct'), 'Octubre',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Nov'), 'Noviembre',
     startsWith(Mes, 'Dic'), 'Diciembre' 
     ),
		Entregado = 'Agencia') ~> CreateColumnsAnoAndMes
SelectFinalColumns sort(asc(year(toDate(Ano, 'Y')), true),
	asc(month(toDate(Mes, 'M')), true)) ~> OrderByAnoAndMes
UnpivotSalesMonths filter(HLVentas != '0') ~> FilterByHLVentaNotEqual0
OrderByAnoAndMes sink(input(
		Ano as integer,
		Mes as string,
		Centro as string,

		UEN as string,

	),

	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseSalesDB

		Material_Material = Material,
		TipoDeEnvase_Material = TipoDeEnvase,
		Produccion_Material = Destino
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumnsMaterial
SourceSynapseFinalTranStatus, SelectColumnsMaterial join(trim(upper(Material)) == trim(upper(Material_Material)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinTranStatusAndMaterial
LeftJoinTranStatusAndMaterial derive(CantidadReal = iif(trim(upper(UnidadMedidaPedido))=='MIL', ((toInteger(CantidadPedido)*1000)/24), toInteger(CantidadPedido)),
		FechaCarga = currentDate()) ~> CreateCantidadRealAndFechaCarga
SortByDocumentoCompras, SelecColumnsTarimas join(trim(upper(DocuCompras)) == trim(upper(EtiquetasFila_Tarima)),
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LeftJoinTranStatus2AndTarimas
SourceSyanpseTarima select(mapColumn(
		EtiquetasFila_Tarima = EtiquetasFila,
		SumaTarimas_Tarima = SumaTarimas
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelecColumnsTarimas
LeftJoinTranStatus2AndTarimas derive(SumaTarimas = 0,
		TarimasLibres = 0) ~> CreateSumaTarimasAndTarimasLibresAndHora
CreateCantidadRealAndFechaCarga sort(asc(DocuCompras, false)) ~> SortByDocumentoCompras
CreateSumaTarimasAndTarimasLibresAndHora sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseMaster

source(output(
		i2 as string,
		{# Sociedad Nueva} as string,
		{# Sociedad Anterior} as string,
		{ID SAG Nueva} as string,
		{ID SAG Anterior} as string,
		DRV_Nva as string,
		DRV as string,
		{Descripción UEN} as string,
		{Descripcion UEN Corto} as string,
		{Descripción SAG} as string,
		Esquema as string,
		Estado as string,
		Tipo as string,
		{Distribución} as string,
		{Puerto Expedición} as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		{Sub Agencia} as string,
		Tipo_Inv as string,
		OrigenJDA as string,
		DestinoJDA as string,
		{Descripción Destino} as string,
		{Tipo Distribución} as string,
		Op as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXLocation
TrimColumns select(mapColumn(
		I2 = i2,
		NSociedadNueva = {# Sociedad Nueva},
		NSociedadAnterior = {# Sociedad Anterior},
		IDSAGNueva = {ID SAG Nueva},
		IDSAGAnterior = {ID SAG Anterior},
		DRVNva = DRV_Nva,
		DRV,
		DescripcionUEN = {Descripción UEN},
		DescripcionUENCorto = {Descripcion UEN Corto},
		DescripcionSAG = {Descripcion UEN Corto},
		Esquema,
		Estado,
		Tipo,
		Distribucion = {Distribución},
		PuertoExpedicion = {Distribución},
		Zona,
		Agencia,
		SubAgencia = {Sub Agencia},
		TipoInv = Tipo_Inv,
		OrigenJDA,
		DestinoJDA,
		DescripcionDestino = {Descripción Destino},
		{TipoDistribución} = {Tipo Distribución}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SourceXLSXLocation derive(i2 = trim(i2),
		{# Sociedad Nueva} = trim({# Sociedad Nueva}),
		{# Sociedad Anterior} = trim({# Sociedad Anterior}),
		{ID SAG Nueva} = trim({ID SAG Nueva}),
		{ID SAG Anterior} = trim({ID SAG Anterior}),
		DRV_Nva = trim(DRV_Nva),
		DRV = trim(DRV),
		{Descripción UEN} = trim({Descripción UEN}),
		{Descripcion UEN Corto} = trim({Descripcion UEN Corto}),
		{Descripción SAG} = trim({Descripción SAG}),
		Esquema = trim(Esquema),
		Estado = trim(Estado),
		Tipo = trim(Tipo),
		{Distribución} = trim({Distribución}),
		{Puerto Expedición} = trim({Puerto Expedición}),
		Zona = trim(Zona),
		Agencia = trim(Agencia),
		{Sub Agencia} = trim({Sub Agencia}),
		Tipo_Inv = trim(Tipo_Inv),
		OrigenJDA = trim(OrigenJDA),
		DestinoJDA = trim(DestinoJDA),
		{Tipo Distribución} = trim({Tipo Distribución}),
		Op = trim(Op)) ~> TrimColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		i2 as string,
		NSociedadNueva as string,
		NSociedadAnterior as string,
		IDSAGNueva as string,
		IDSAGAnterior as string,
		DRVNva as string,
		DRV as string,
		DescripcionUEN as string,
		DescripcionUENCorto as string,
		Esquema as string,
		Estado as string,
		Tipo as string,
		Distribucion as string,
		Zona as string,
		Agencia as string,
		SubAgencia as string,
		TipoInv as string,
		OrigenJDA as string,
		DestinoJDA as string,
		DescripcionDestino as string,
		{TipoDistribución} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		i2 = I2,
		NSociedadNueva,
		NSociedadAnterior,
		IDSAGNueva,
		IDSAGAnterior,
		DRVNva,
		DRV,
		DescripcionUEN,
		DescripcionUENCorto,
		Esquema,
		Estado,
		Tipo,
		Distribucion,
		Zona,
		Agencia,
		SubAgencia,
		TipoInv,
		OrigenJDA,
		DestinoJDA,
		DescripcionDestino,
		{TipoDistribución}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseDestination

source(output(
		Material as string,
		I2 as string,
		{Texto breve de material} as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Color as string,
		{Tipo de Envase} as string,
		{Cupo Agrupado} as string,
		Factor as string,
		{Cajas x Tarima} as string,
		Destino as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SourceXLSXPacking
TrimColumns select(mapColumn(
		Material,
		I2,
		TextoBreveDeMaterial = {Texto breve de material},
		Marca,
		Cupo,
		Color,
		TipoDeEnvase = {Tipo de Envase},
		CupoAgrupado = {Cupo Agrupado},
		Factor,
		CajaPorTarima = {Cajas x Tarima},
		Destino
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectColumns
SourceXLSXPacking derive(Material = trim(Material),
		I2 = trim(I2),
		{Texto breve de material} = trim({Texto breve de material}),
		Marca = trim({Marca}),
		Cupo = trim({Cupo}),
		Color = trim(Color),
		{Tipo de Envase} = trim({Tipo de Envase}),
		{Cupo Agrupado} = trim({Cupo Agrupado}),
		Factor = trim(Factor),
		{Cajas x Tarima} = trim({Cajas x Tarima}),
		Destino = trim(Destino)) ~> TrimColumns
SelectColumns sink(input(
		Material as string,
		I2 as string,
		TextoBreveDeMaterial as string,
		Marca as string,
		Cupo as string,
		Color as string,
		TipoDeEnvase as string,
		CupoAgrupado as string,
		Factor as string,
		CajaPorTarima as string,
		Destino as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	recreate:true,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		Material,
		I2,
		TextoBreveDeMaterial,
		Marca,
		Cupo,
		Color,
		TipoDeEnvase,
		CupoAgrupado,
		Factor,
		CajaPorTarima,
		Destino
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> DestinationSynapseMaterial
